roleset.name: make gluten like
roleset.note: GLUTENIZE-V NOTES: Edited by hwangd (from glutenize.01-v)

example.name: Transitive
example.text: I accidentally glutenized myself last week. I would rather not eat at all than consume gluten, but got a bag of Doritos from a vending machine...

example.name: Intransitive
example.text: If the dough is very moist, the flour will glutenize on its own.
example.arg: If the dough is very moist
